attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Primary school children do a six to a six and a half hour day,five days a week from the very young age of four with extra traveling time to and from school extending these long hours, then when they get home they have homework that covers evening time and weekends, we need our children to have family time and time to do what they do best and that is play and be creative,they need time to rest and recharge, both of my children are finding this regime exhausting and I ask the government to reconsider their stand on this issue by banning homework in primary schools and letting our children be children

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
